Description: Eaton Square is an apartment community uniquely situated in Hyattsville, Maryland just 15 minutes away from the excitement of Washington, DC. This boutique community is nestled on well-kept, wooded landscaping. We are across the street from the Prince Georges Sportsplex, minutes to NSA, Ft. Meade, Goddard Space Flight Center, University of Maryland, PG County Community Colleges, University of Maryland University College, Woodmore Town Center, Wegmans, and Costco. Our location allows for easy access to 1-295, 1-495, 1-95, BW Parkway and many other routes within the Prince Georges County highway system. Boasting spacious two bedroom designs, this is the perfect community for you. Our apartment homes offer renovated kitchens any gourmet chef would love, individual climate control, spacious closets, and plush carpets. Eaton Square offers a playground for your children and their friends and plenty of open space for you and your dog to run around. Contact our leasing department and find your moment at Eaton Square today!
